de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.message.handler

Interface TnccsHandlerBuilder<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the handler type (e.g. TNCC or TNCS handler)
    All Superinterfaces:
    HandlerBuilder<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultTnccHandlerBuilder, DefaultTnccsValidationExceptionHandlerBuilder, DefaultTncsHandlerBuilder

    public interface TnccsHandlerBuilder<T>
extends HandlerBuilder<T>
    Generic builder to build a message handler, handling IF-TNCCS message destined for a TNC(C/S). The builder can be used in a fluent way.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TnccsHandlerBuilder<T> setAttributes(de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.attribute.Attributed attributes)
      Sets the accessible session and/or connection attributes used to build the handler.

      • Methods inherited from interface de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.message.handler.HandlerBuilder

        toHandler

    • Method Detail

        Sets the accessible session and/or connection attributes used to build the handler.

        Returns:
